content: अभिव्यक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Manifestation (of a cause as an effect); distinction, exposition, declaration, revelation, display, exhibition; सर्वांगसौष्ठवाभिव्यक्तये <ls>M. 1</ls>; दूतीसंप्रेषणैर्नार्या भावाभिव्यक्तिरिष्यते <ls>S. D. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Association, concomitance; <ls>P. VIII. 1. 15</ls> (<ls>Sk.</ls> = साहचर्यं).
